title: Ecological Dynamics-Based Online Training for Intercept Skill Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Basic motor skills and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Utilizing video and graphic simulation materials in a smartphone-centric, limited technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain core elements of interception techniques by applying ecological dynamics principles
Learners can improve interception prediction accuracy by 30% using smartphone-based simulation tools
Learners can measure situational response speed and decision accuracy through a real-time feedback system

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
